1370: Ludingus was born in Muelen straet in 1370.
Got married to Alretieren at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Alretieren, Heilsota, at age 20.
1372: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Mette, at age 22.
1375: Had a son with Alretieren, Anselmi, at age 25.
1377: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Lenildis, at age 27.
1379: Had a son with Alretieren, Gabriel, at age 29.
1381: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Esa, at age 31.
1391: Lost daughter Lenildis when Lenildis was 15 years old.
